DataElement.preferredName: Platelet Transfusion Recipient Occurrence Exposure Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of exposures of platelet transfusion recipient occurrences.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An irregular, disc-shaped element in the blood that assists in blood clotting. Platelets are not blood cells, they are fragments of large bone marrow cells called megakaryocytes._A person who receives a direct injection of whole blood or blood products derived from a blood donor._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
